### Overview

Please provide a detailed summary of your issue.

**DO NOT INCLUDE ANY CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR PROJECT**
If this is unavoidable or you are unsure, please open a Radar using Component AIS AWS Security | General Requests and include a link to it in the issue here.

### Subject of the issue
Describe your issue here.

### Your environment
* AWS account name and ID
* Version of awsappleconnect CLI
* VPCs/instance IDs/resources

### Steps to reproduce
Tell us how to reproduce this issue. Include logs or exact command lines/configurations.

### Expected behavior
Tell us what should happen

### Actual behavior
Tell us what happens instead

### Request by Date (Optional): 

If this fix is needed by a certain date, specify the date and explain the reason it is needed by that date.
The Cloud Platform team will take this into consideration when sprint planning.
